[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Offer” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” background_image=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/jk9dt34tfui.jpg” custom_padding=”39px||32px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” filter_brightness=”127%” locked=”off”][et_pb_row custom_margin=”10px|auto||auto||” _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto|on||on|” text_font_size=”24px” text_letter_spacing=”4px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%”]Exclusive Offer[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”||||” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”]

AMAZING AUSTRALIA

9 DAYS/8 NIGHTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ custom_padding=”38px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”30px|0px|21px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_margin=”-31px|auto|9px|auto||” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.9″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

ITINERARY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”27px|0px|26px|0px|false|false” custom_margin=”15px|auto||auto||” admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”177px” custom_margin=”-35px||45px||false|” custom_padding=”0px||3px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 01: ARRIVAL AT MELBOURNE

Upon completion of custom formalities, you will be transferred to the hotel.

Evening at leisure.

Overnight at Melbourne hotel.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”200px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 02: MELBOURNE – GREAT OCEAN ROAD – MELBOURNE

After breakfast we shall proceed for a full day excursion to the Great Ocean Road, spanning 243 kilometres along the stunning coastline of Victoria’s south-west. Take in the panoramic views as the road winds along the cliff tops, up to breath-taking headlands, down onto the edge of beaches. Enjoy splendid views of the towering 12 Apostles & the Loch Ard Gorge.

In the evening return to Melbourne.

Overnight at Melbourne hotel.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”73px” custom_margin=”1px|||||” custom_padding=”0px||4px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 03: FULL DAY PHILIP ISLAND TOUR

Breakfast.

Today you will enjoy a Full Day Philip Island Tour. On this day you can have the posibility to see penguins, kangaroos & koalas. Phillip Island is home of the famous Penguin Parade, Phillip Island also features a stunning coastline with great surf conditions and a range of wildlife including the largest colony of fur seals in Australia. Nobbies Rock Formations is named for its unique rock formations. Located at the western tip of the island, this area has high conservation significance. Nobbies viewing is seasonal and dependent on daylight hours.

Penguin Parade: Head down to Summerland Beach to witness penguin magic. As the sunsets, the wild little penguins emerge from the sea after a hard day fishing and waddle across the sand to their dune burrows.

Overnight at Melbourne hotel.

                     

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”33px||33px||false|” custom_padding=”5px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 04: MELBOURNE – CAIRNS

Complete the hotel checkout precoss. After breakfast, transfer to Melbourne Airport for the flight to Cairns.

Cairns is considered the gateway to Australia’s Great Barrier Reef. On arrival, transfer to the hotel.

Overnight in Cairns.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”10px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 05: CAIRNS – GREAT BARRIER REEF – CAIRNS

After breakfast, today we proceed to the Great Barrier Reef. One of Australia’s most remarkable natural gifts, the Great Barrier Reef is blessed with the breathtaking beauty of the world’s largest coral reef. The reef contains an abundance of marine life and comprises of over 3000 individual reef system, coral cays and literally hundreds of picturesque tropical islands with some of the world’s most beautiful sun-soaked, golden beaches. Experience great view of the reef through glass bottom boat and explore the world of corals. In the sheltered lagoon you will see a multitude of giant clams, turtles, sea stars, and reef fish. This offers a perfect snorkeling or diving experience in warm clear protected waters. In the evening we return to Cairns.

       

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”91px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 06: CAIRNS – SYDNEY

After breakfast, proceed to the airport to board your flight to Sydney. On arrival, transfer to the hotel. Check-in at the hotel (Standard check-in after 1400hrs).

Overnight in Sydney.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”89px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”1px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 07: FULL DAY BLUE MOUNTAINS INCLUDING PARRAMATTA CRUISE

Breakfast.

Today we will visit the Blue Mountains. Experience the majestic Blue Mountains, a UNESCO World Heritage Site with a small-group. Enjoy the sweeping views of the mountains and sites including the Three Sisters and Jamison Valley. Hop onboard the Scenic Railway (or other rides) at Scenic World, enjoy a chef-prepared lunch. Then, cruise by boat back to Sydney Harbor on the Parramatta River.

Overnight in Sydney.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”183px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 08: HOP ON HOP OFF TOUR

Breakfast.

Join a hop-on hop-off sightseeing tour by double-decker bus to discover the highlights of Sydney and Bondi Beach. Enjoy unobstructed views and recorded onboard commentary as you travel along two routes to top destinations like Sydney Harbor Bridge, Sydney Opera House, Darling Harbor, and Bondi Beach. Go in-depth at any given place by simply hopping off the bus to explore. You can experience Sydney and Bondi’s most noteworthy attractions at your own pace.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”9px” custom_margin=”-4px||47px|||” custom_padding=”3px|||||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 09: DEPARTURE FROM SYDNEY

Breakfast at hotel.

Check out of the hotel (Standard check out before 1000hrs). Transfer to Sydney Airport for your departure flight.

Have a safe trip!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”More Places” _builder_version=”3.0.76″ min_height=”873px” custom_margin=”-412px||142px|||” custom_padding=”0||50px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” global_module=”117″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_blurb url=”http://www.facebook.com/pages/Discover-Destinations/156630901051625″ use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%291%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ _builder_version=”3.15″]
